Plot: A pair of childhood friends and neighbors fall for each other's sons.
Title: Adore
Writer: Anne Fontaine (screenplay), Christopher Hampton (story), Anne Fontaine (story), Doris Lessing (book)
Actors: Naomi Watts, Robin Wright, Xavier Samuel, James Frecheville
tomatoConsensus: Naomi Watts and Robin Wright give it their all, but they can't quite make Adore's trashy, absurd plot believable.
